text: Uralsky Trubnik Stadium is a sports venue in Pervouralsk, the only one in the Russian Bandy Super League without artificial ice. It is the home of SKA- Sverdlovsk and Uralsky Trubnik.http://www.rusbandy.ru/stadium/18/ ==References== Category:Bandy venues in Russia Category:Sport in Sverdlovsk Oblast
title: Uralsky Trubnik Stadium
